SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.controller.MainController
@Component public class MainController extends Object
Intermediary layer that manages communication between the database layer and the GUI. Some methods call methods in the view layer, while others are designed to be called by the view layer.

    • AddIngredientToRegistry

      public void AddIngredientToRegistry(IDAmountStruct ingredientInfo, String unit, String[] tags)
      Adds an ingredient to the ingredient registry
      Parameters:
      ingredientInfo - The name and amount of the ingredient
      unit - The unit of the ingredient
      tags - The tags of the ingredient
      Throws:
      Exception - if the ingredient is not found in the database, if the ingredient is a duplicate, or if there is an error loading data from the view

    • AlterFridgeIngredientAmount

      public void AlterFridgeIngredientAmount(IDAmountStruct ingredient) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the amount of a specific ingredient in the fridge Can be used to alter amount, or remove if the new amount is 0
      Parameters:
      ingredient - The name of the ingredient to alter + the new amount
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a non-existant ingredient is attempted removed from the fridge.

    • AlterPurchasePlanItemAmount

      public void AlterPurchasePlanItemAmount(IDAmountStruct item)
      Sets the amount of a specific ingredient in the fridge Can be used to alter amount, or remove if the new amount is 0
      Parameters:
      item - The name of the item to alter + the new amount
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a non-existent item is attempted removed from the purchase plan.
